clock 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

High Level API

This section contains the high level API for usage with R’s native date and date-time types, Date, POSIXct, and POSIXlt. If you are new to clock, this is the best place to start.

date_group()

Group date and date-time components

date_group(<Date>)

Group date components

date_group(<POSIXt>)

Group date-time components

date_leap_year()

Is the year a leap year?

date_floor() date_ceiling() date_round()

Date and date-time rounding

date_floor(<Date>) date_ceiling(<Date>) date_round(<Date>)

Rounding: date

date_floor(<POSIXt>) date_ceiling(<POSIXt>) date_round(<POSIXt>)

Rounding: date-time

get_year(<Date>) get_month(<Date>) get_day(<Date>)

Getters: date

get_year(<POSIXt>) get_month(<POSIXt>) get_day(<POSIXt>) get_hour(<POSIXt>) get_minute(<POSIXt>) get_second(<POSIXt>)

Getters: date-time

set_year(<Date>) set_month(<Date>) set_day(<Date>)

Setters: date

set_year(<POSIXt>) set_month(<POSIXt>) set_day(<POSIXt>) set_hour(<POSIXt>) set_minute(<POSIXt>) set_second(<POSIXt>)

Setters: date-time

add_years(<Date>) add_quarters(<Date>) add_months(<Date>) add_weeks(<Date>) add_days(<Date>)

Arithmetic: date

add_years(<POSIXt>) add_quarters(<POSIXt>) add_months(<POSIXt>) add_weeks(<POSIXt>) add_days(<POSIXt>) add_hours(<POSIXt>) add_minutes(<POSIXt>) add_seconds(<POSIXt>)

Arithmetic: date-time

as_zoned_time(<Date>)

Convert to a zoned-time from a date

as_zoned_time(<POSIXt>)

Convert to a zoned-time from a date-time

Calendars

calendar_group()

Group calendar components

calendar_leap_year()

Is the calendar year a leap year?

calendar_narrow()

Narrow a calendar to a less precise precision

calendar_widen()

Widen a calendar to a more precise precision

get_year() get_quarter() get_month() get_week() get_day() get_hour() get_minute() get_second() get_millisecond() get_microsecond() get_nanosecond() get_index()

Calendar getters

set_year() set_quarter() set_month() set_week() set_day() set_hour() set_minute() set_second() set_millisecond() set_microsecond() set_nanosecond() set_index()
